attributes.action: Lower grade boundaries for all 2020 GCSEs, a levels and university level exams!
attributes.additional_details: We want them lowered because of all the school closures and students as well as teachers being absent courses haven’t been finished, we haven’t had the support years before us have received and our exams won’t be fair in comparison to the years before because of all the disruption!
attributes.background: We want all grade boundaries to be lowered for all 2020 exams, we also want the exams to be fair considering the disruption to school life.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced the closure of secondary schools to most pupils, and has said that it will work with the sector and Ofqual to ensure children get the qualifications they need: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/schools-colleges-and-early-years-settings-to-close

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:
NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
